CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 13, reads: "Smart Chapeaux - One of the features of the annual garden party, sponsored by the Pittsburgh Chapter of the Ladies Auxiliary of Lincoln University, last Sunday, was the awarding of prizes for the prettiest and smartest hats at the event. Mrs. Nellye [Nellie] Barron, second from left, won first prize, with Mrs. Juanita Monroe, runner-up.  Beautiful corsages were pinned on them by Mrs. Ruby Hord, left, and Mrs. Edith Crump, right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Ruby Hord, Nellie Barron, Juanita Monroe, and Edith Crump, gathered on lawn for annual garden party sponsored by the Pittsburgh Chapter of the Ladies Auxiliary of Lincoln University, another version
